user_query: I'm organizing a team-building event for my company and I need some unique ideas. Can you recommend adventure sports activities, team-building exercises, and nearby webcams to capture the fun moments?

TaskList.description: Research unique adventure sports activities suitable for team-building.
Compile a list of team-building exercises that complement the adventure sports.
Find nearby webcams that can stream or capture the team-building event.
Create a combined itinerary for the team-building event including adventure sports and exercises.
